snippet.title: Battle Breakers - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Monsters from space trapped the world’s greatest Heroes in technomagic crystal. Now it’s up to you to assemble the ultimate team of super warriors and take back your planet, one break at a time, in this 90s cartoon-inspired, Hero Collector RPG created as a passion project by a small team at Epic Games.

Battle Breakers is now available to everyone on PC on the Epic Games Store, iOS on the App Store, and Android in the Epic Games app and the Samsung Galaxy Store.

Learn more: https://www.epicgames.com/battlebreakers/home
Twitter: https://twitter.com/battlebreakers
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/battlebreakers/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/battlebreakers/
